channel.title: Plz help
channel.description: ok i tryed everthing. :confused: i tryed port forwarding but it never makes any sense so i can get my server up by typing my ip in the ip slot and on port 43594 yay im on it...but i can not ever post it on server status it just says thet it is off line plz help

item.title: Plz help
item.dc:creator: @Drew_Scape Drew_Scape
item.description:
@Drew_Scape wrote:

Step 1: Go to your computer in your task bar down their \
Step 2: Go to Support and find you Gateway IP
Step 3: Go write the IP down.
Step 4: Open up your web browser (Firefox, Internet Explorer)
Step 5: Type in that IP
Step 6: Put in Username: Admin Password: Admin or Username blank.
Step 7: Go to Advanced or Applications and gamming
Step 8: Application type: HTTP Port: 43594 end 55555 or 43594 Protocol: UDP and then tick enable
And your done

Read full topic
